title: arXiv 的 AI 禁令是误导性的！
description: arXiv 的新政策禁止直接提交未经审查的调查和立场文件，以解决人工智能生成内容的扩散问题，但压制不如指导。
titleZh: arXiv 的 AI 禁令是误导性的！
titleEn: arXiv's AI ban is misguided! 18 universities jointly launch the first AI research review platform
descriptionZh: arXiv 的新政策禁止直接提交未经审查的调查和立场文件，以解决人工智能生成内容的扩散问题，但压制不如指导。
descriptionEn: arXiv's new policy prohibits direct submission of unreviewed survey and position papers to address the proliferation of AI-generated content, but suppression is inferior to guidance. Eighteen top universities including University of Toronto, Tsinghua and Peking have jointly launched aiXiv - a platform supporting collaborative writing, review and iteration of research by AI and humans, implementing multi-stage AI peer review to enhance efficiency and quality. This transformation has sparked deep reflection on traditional academic publishing systems, while raising both expectations and concerns about future research models.
